author: Not available

text.0: Mæg ic be me sylfum      soðgied wrecan,
text.10: hat ymb heortan;      hungor innan slat
text.100: gold to geoce      for godes egsan,
text.101: þonne he hit ær hydeð      þenden he her leofað.
text.102: Micel biþ se meotudes egsa,      forþon hi seo molde oncyrreð;
text.105: Dol biþ se þe him his dryhten ne ondrædeþ;      cymeð him se deað unþinged.
text.106: Eadig bið se þe eaþmod leofaþ;      cymeð him seo ar of heofonum,
text.107: meotod him þæt mod gestaþelað,      forþon he in his meahte gelyfeð.
text.108: Stieran mon sceal strongum mode,      ond þæt on staþelum healdan,
text.11: merewerges mod.      þæt se mon ne wat
text.110: scyle monna gehwylc      mid gemete healdan
text.111: wiþ leofne ond wið laþne      bealo,
text.112: þeah þe he hine wille fyres      fulne
text.115: meotud meahtigra      þonne ænges monnes gehygd.
text.116: Uton we hycgan      hwær we ham agen,
text.117: ond þonne geþencan      hu we þider cumen,
text.118: ond we þonne eac tilien,      þæt we to moten
text.12: þe him on foldan      fægrost limpeð,
text.120: þær is lif gelong      in lufan dryhtnes,
text.121: hyht in heofonum.      þæs sy þam halgan þonc,
text.122: þæt he usic geweorþade,      wuldres ealdor,
text.17: þær ic ne gehyrde      butan hlimman sæ,
text.19: dyde ic me to gomene,      ganetes hleoþor
text.20: ond huilpan sweg      fore hleahtor wera,
text.22: Stormas þær stanclifu beotan,      þær him stearn oncwæð
text.23: isigfeþera;      ful oft þæt earn bigeal,
text.26: Forþon him gelyfeð lyt,      se þe ah lifes wyn
text.28: wlonc ond wingal,      hu ic werig oft
text.31: hrim hrusan bond,      hægl feol on eorþan,
text.33: heortan geþohtas,      þæt ic hean streamas,
text.36: ferð to feran,      þæt ic feor heonan
text.38: Forþon nis þæs modwlonc      mon ofer eorþan,
text.39: ne his gifena þæs god,      ne in geoguþe to þæs hwæt,
text.40: ne in his dædum to þæs deor,      ne him his dryhten to þæs hold,
text.41: þæt he a his sæfore      sorge næbbe,
text.42: to hwon hine dryhten      gedon wille.
text.43: Ne biþ him to hearpan hyge      ne to hringþege,
text.44: ne to wife wyn      ne to worulde hyht,
text.45: ne ymbe owiht elles,      nefne ymb yða gewealc,
text.46: ac a hafað longunge      se þe on lagu fundað.
text.5: atol yþa gewealc,      þær mec oft bigeat
text.50: sefan to siþe,      þam þe swa þenceð
text.54: bitter in breosthord.      þæt se beorn ne wat,
text.57: Forþon nu min hyge hweorfeð      ofer hreþerlocan,
text.60: eorþan sceatas,      cymeð eft to me
text.63: ofer holma gelagu.      Forþon me hatran sind
text.64: dryhtnes dreamas      þonne þis deade lif,
text.65: læne on londe.      Ic gelyfe no
text.68: ær his tid aga,      to tweon weorþeð;
text.7: þonne he be clifum cnossað.      Calde geþrungen
text.73: þæt he gewyrce,      ær he on weg scyle,
text.76: þæt hine ælda bearn      æfter hergen,
text.77: ond his lof siþþan      lifge mid englum
text.79: dream mid dugeþum.      Dagas sind gewitene,
text.83: þonne hi mæst mid him      mærþa gefremedon
text.85: Gedroren is þeos duguð eal,      dreamas sind gewitene,
text.86: wuniað þa wacran      ond þas woruld healdaþ,
text.87: brucað þurh bisgo.      Blæd is gehnæged,
text.89: swa nu monna gehwylc      geond middangeard.
text.9: caldum clommum,      þær þa ceare seofedun
text.90: Yldo him on fareð,      onsyn blacað,
text.93: Ne mæg him þonne se flæschoma,      þonne him þæt feorg losað,
text.94: ne swete forswelgan      ne sar gefelan,
text.95: ne hond onhreran      ne mid hyge þencan.
text.96: þeah þe græf wille      golde stregan
text.97: broþor his geborenum,      byrgan be deadum,
text.98: maþmum mislicum      þæt hine mid wille,
text.99: ne mæg þære sawle      þe biþ synna ful

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
